Package org.neo4j.memory

Interface MemoryPool

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ScopedMemoryPool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoltNettyMemoryPool, DatabaseMemoryGroupTracker, DelegatingMemoryPool, GlobalMemoryGroupTracker, MemoryPoolImpl, MemoryPools.NoTrackingMemoryPool
    public interface MemoryPool
    A pool of memory that consumers can reserve memory from.

    You can also query the usage of it, with the contract that pool.totalUsed() + pool.free() == pool.totalSize()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long free()
      Returns the number of bytes that can still be reserved from this pool.
      void releaseHeap​(long bytes)
      Give back previously reserved heap memory.
      void releaseNative​(long bytes)
      Give back previously reserved native memory.
      void reserveHeap​(long bytes)
      Grab a chunk of memory.
      void reserveNative​(long bytes)
      Grab a chunk of native memory.
      void setSize​(long size)
      Updates the total size of the pool.
      long totalSize()
      Returns the total size of this pool in bytes.
      default long totalUsed()
      Returns the number of total heap and native bytes.
      long usedHeap()
      Returns the number of reserved heap bytes.
      long usedNative()
      Returns the number of reserved native bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • reserveHeap

        void reserveHeap​(long bytes)
        Grab a chunk of memory. This method might throw if there is no available memory.
        Parameters:
        bytes - number of bytes to reserve
        Throws:
        MemoryLimitExceededException - if the are not enough free memory to fulfill the reservation

      • reserveNative

        void reserveNative​(long bytes)
        Grab a chunk of native memory. This method might throw if there is no available memory.
        Parameters:
        bytes - number of bytes to reserve
        Throws:
        MemoryLimitExceededException - if the are not enough free memory to fulfill the reservation

      • releaseHeap

        void releaseHeap​(long bytes)
        Give back previously reserved heap memory. This will never throw.
        Parameters:
        bytes - number of bytes to give back

      • releaseNative

        void releaseNative​(long bytes)
        Give back previously reserved native memory. This will never throw.
        Parameters:
        bytes - number of bytes to give back

      • totalSize

        long totalSize()
        Returns the total size of this pool in bytes.
        Returns:
        the size of the pool in bytes, Long.MAX_VALUE is returned for unbounded pools

      • usedHeap

        long usedHeap()
        Returns the number of reserved heap bytes.
        Returns:
        the number or reserved bytes.

      • usedNative

        long usedNative()
        Returns the number of reserved native bytes.
        Returns:
        the number or reserved bytes.

      • totalUsed

        default long totalUsed()
        Returns the number of total heap and native bytes.
        Returns:
        the total number or reserved bytes.

      • free

        long free()
        Returns the number of bytes that can still be reserved from this pool.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes that are not used by anyone.

      • setSize

        void setSize​(long size)
        Updates the total size of the pool.
        Parameters:
        size - the new size of the pool.
